text: HotNewHipHop (HNHH) is an online publication that covers daily news about hip hop and pop culture, including streetwear, sports, and sneakers. HotNewHipHop also creates the video series'; How to Roll, On The Come Up, In My Bag, and Snack Review. The site was nominated a lot of times for the BET Hip Hop Awards for "The Best Hip Hop Platform." ==References== Category:2007 establishments in Canada Category:Hip hop Category:Canadian websites Category:Music websites
title: HotNewHipHop
